closed.title: Degraded Services | Western and Eastern Cape
closed.description: Our upstream provider is experiencing an outage in the Western and Eastern Cape that is affecting Afrihost services in the area. We are working with them to resolve the issue as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

updates.content: NLD's has been restored and we are monitoring for stability. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
The NLD outage has been partially restored. Clients may experience degraded services whilst our upstream work on fully resolving the outage.
Outage is being caused by multiple NLD failures, teams are working on resolving the issue as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
